name: Tuoyawon
description:
Our first ever 3D jam game!

Turned out pretty nice (at least graphically), and it was fun to finally make a 3D game after such a long time.
 Theme was Conspiracy Theories. We went for aerie and surrealistic atmosphere, aiming to convey a feeling of falling deeper and deeper into a "rabbit hole" of conspiracy theories and disinformation. Perhaps a too large bite for a 2 days long jam, but whatever.

Can you find a way out of the maze?
(Yes, you can actually get out in the game) Enjoy! Known Issues:
  • In-Game menu buttons can become unresponsive.
